results.name: Coefficient triangle of generalized Laguerre polynomials (a=1).
comment: Same as A008297 (Lah triangle) except for signs.
Row sums give A066668. Unsigned row sums give A000262.

The Laguerre polynomials L(n;x;a=1) under discussion are connected with Hermite-Bell polynomials p(n;x) for power -1 (see also A215216) defined by the following relation: p(n;x) := x^(2n)*exp(x^(-1))*(d^n exp(-x^(-1))/dx^n). We have L(n;x;a=1)=(-x)^(n-1)*p(n;1/x), p(n+1;x)=x^2(dp(n;x)/dx)+(1-2*n*x)p(n;x), and p(1;x)=1, p(2;x)=1-2*x, p(3;x)=1-6*x+6*x^2, p(4;x)=1-12*x+36*x^2-24*x^3, p(5;x)=1-20*x+120*x^2-240*x^3+120*x^4. Note that if we set w(n;x):=x^(2n)*p(n;1/x) then w(n+1;x)=(w(n;x)-(dw(n;x)/dx))*x^2, which is almost analogous to the recurrence formula for Bell polynomials B(n+1;x)=(B(n;x)+(dB(n;x)/dx))*x. - _Roman Witula_, Aug 06 2012.
